SA20n1344:6: paratra loko na tathātinirdayaḥ pravartate tāpanakarmaṇāripau |
SA20n1344:7: yathā parārthaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhatāpane kṛpātmakaḥ svātmani saṃpravartate ||3 ||
SA20n1344:11: tathāgatajñānamanuttaraṃ padaṃ parārtha eṣa tryadhiko daśātmakaḥ ||5 ||
SA20n1344:13: kṣamā ca dāntā ca sudūragā'kṣayā jinātmajānāṃ pratipattiruttamā ||6 ||
SA20n1344:14: mahābhaye kāmijanaḥ pravartate cale viparyāsasukhe bhavapriyaḥ |
SA20n1344:15: pratisvamādhipraśame śamapriyaḥ sadā tu sarvādhiga[śa]me kṛpātmakaḥ ||7 ||
SA20n1344:16: jano vimūḍhaḥ svasukhārthamudyataḥ sadā tadaprāpya paraiti duḥkhatām |
SA20n1344:17: sadā tu dhīro hi parārthamudyato dvayārthamādhāya paraiti nirvṛtim ||8 ||
SA20n1344:18: yathā yathā hyakṣavicitragocare pravartate cāragato jinātmajaḥ |
SA20n1344:21: akāmakāreṇa hi viprapattayo jane bhavantīti kṛpāvivṛddhitaḥ ||10 ||
